How It Works

For Buyers:

1. Register
2. Manage your preferences
3. Search the database for products and suppliers
4. Send Enquiries & Messages
5. Receive offers
For Suppliers:

1. Register
2. Update Company profile
3. Update product profile
4. Stockists and contractors can list the products available in Stock and inventory module
5. Rental companies can list their equipment in the rental section
6. Receive Enquiries & Messages
7. Send offers
